"THE KINGDOM" stars Kevin Spacey as King David II, who is an illegitimate son of King David I and his wife, Bathsheba. David II is an alcoholic and has been serving in various capacities in the Israeli military during the 1980s and 1990s. 

In summary, both "The Negotiator" (2001) and "The Kingdom" (2007) are highly recommended movies that capture a unique blend of suspense, drama, and action.

I would highly recommend Jumper. The movie stars Hayden Christensen and is based on the novel of the same name by Richard Kripke.

In Jumper, Christensen plays a young man named Tommy. Tommy discovers that he has the ability to jump great distances. With this power, Tommy decides to become a superhero, known as Jump.

The acting in Jumper is also superb. In addition to Christensen, other notable actors in Jumper include:

- Zachary Quinto: Quinto plays the role of President Richard Nixon.
- Benicio Del Toro: Del Toro plays the role of Salvadoran revolutionary leader Jose Angel Guevara.
- Michael Keaton: Keaton plays the role of电动ian Jim Hargrave.
- Samuel L. Jackson: Jackson plays the role of private investigator James "Bones" Novak, Jr.
- Uma Thurman: Thurman plays the role of fashion designer Lilac von Bingen.
- Richard Dreyfuss: Dreyfuss plays the role of United States Senator Dan Molloy.

Another notable actor in Jumper is:

- Michael Caine: Caine plays the role of British police detective Harry Potter, also known as "Hogwarts"".

The technical aspects of Jumper are also highly impressive. In addition to its excellent cinematography and visual effects, Jumper also features some very impressive sound design.

Overall, I would highly recommend Jumper to anyone who enjoys action movies with a strong emphasis on special effects and visual effects.

I would highly recommend Hotel Rwanda, directed by James DeMonaco and starring Cara Seymour. The film tells the story of Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager who shelters over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

Hotel Rwanda received numerous awards including Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay. It is definitely worth watching.

I would also recommend you to check out The Perfect Storm, directed by Stephen Dillane and starring Cherry Jones. This movie tells the story of a group of fishermen who are caught in an unusually intense storm pattern that puts them in mortal danger.
